articles.title: How Taylor Swift Feels About Each "Bad Blood" Video Star Now
articles.description: In honor of '1989’s re-release, here's an investigation into where Swift stands with each member of her “Bad Blood” posse in 2023.
articles.content: Welcome to the 1989-verse. Theres an undeniable allure to Taylor Swifts fifth album, which was re-released on Oct. 27. Before its original release in 2014, Swift dominated the country-pop genre with … [+16066 chars]
